column5: Textual description of the business item- Long form description
A thin and lightweight laptop designed for portability and everyday use, running the macOS operating system.
A powerful laptop designed for professional users requiring advanced computing capabilities, featuring macOS.
A desktop computer integrating the display and computing components in a single unit, running macOS.
A small form-factor desktop computer designed for versatility and space-saving, operating on macOS.
A desktop computer offering high performance and expandability tailored for creative professionals, running macOS.
A modular and highly configurable desktop computer designed for intensive professional workloads, operating on macOS.
The proprietary operating system developed by Apple for its Mac line of personal computers, providing a user-friendly interface and ecosystem integration.
Apple's platform offering advertising solutions across its digital properties to businesses and marketers.
Extended warranty and technical support services provided by Apple for its hardware products.
Apple's cloud-based services including iCloud storage, backup, and synchronization across devices.
Apple's online platform for distributing and purchasing applications for iOS, macOS, and other Apple operating systems.
A subscription-based service offering access to a curated collection of games across Apple devices.
A subscription service providing guided workouts and fitness programs integrated with Apple Watch and other devices.
A subscription-based music streaming platform offering a vast library of songs and playlists.
A subscription service providing access to premium news articles and magazines.
A digital streaming service offering movies, TV shows, and original content.
A credit card issued by Apple offering cashback and integration with Apple Pay and Wallet.
A mobile payment and digital wallet service enabling secure payments using Apple devices.
The newest model of Apple's smartwatch line offering health, fitness, and connectivity features.
A cost-effective version of the Apple Watch providing essential features and performance.
A premium smartwatch designed for extreme sports and outdoor activities with enhanced durability.
Apple's standard wireless earbuds offering seamless connectivity and sound quality.
Premium wireless earbuds featuring active noise cancellation and enhanced audio performance.
High-fidelity over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation and spatial audio support.

Google Cloud Platform offers a suite of cloud computing services including computing, data storage, data analytics, and machine learning, enabling organizations to build, deploy, and scale applications efficiently.
Google Workspace provides cloud-based productivity and collaboration tools such as Gmail, Docs, Drive, Calendar, and Meet, designed to enhance business communication and teamwork.
Google Cloud offers AI-optimized infrastructure including specialized hardware and software designed to accelerate machine learning and artificial intelligence applications for enterprises.

column4: Tools and frameworks for AI development
column5: The AI development platform provides developers with tools, APIs, and frameworks to build, train, and deploy AI models and applications efficiently on Google Cloud.
Assistive agents are AI-driven virtual assistants and chatbots that help businesses automate customer service, improve user engagement, and streamline operations.

column4: Software applications hosted on the cloud
column5: Google Cloud offers a variety of cloud-hosted applications that support business functions such as data analytics, security, and application development.
Google Cloud provides access to pre-trained AI models and tools to customize models for specific business needs, enabling faster deployment of AI solutions.
Google Cloud offers a range of business productivity tools designed to improve efficiency, collaboration, and workflow automation within organizations.
Google Search is a widely used web search engine that organizes and makes information universally accessible and useful to users worldwide.

column4: Online video sharing and streaming platform
column5: YouTube is a platform for uploading, sharing, and viewing videos, offering entertainment, education, and user-generated content globally.
Android is an open-source mobile operating system used by a wide range of smartphones and devices, providing access to apps and services.
Chrome is a fast, secure, and widely used web browser that enables users to access the internet and web applications.
Gmail is a free email service offering robust spam protection, integration with other Google services, and a user-friendly interface.
Google Maps provides mapping, navigation, and location-based services to help users find places, get directions, and explore the world.

column4: Digital distribution platform for apps and media
column5: Google Play Store is a digital marketplace for downloading and purchasing apps, games, movies, books, and other digital content for Android devices.
The YouTube Partner Program enables content creators to monetize their videos through ads, channel memberships, and other revenue streams.
Moonshot projects are experimental initiatives aimed at developing breakthrough technologies and solutions to solve large-scale problems beyond core Google services.
Other Bets focuses on creating and advancing innovative technologies that have the potential to transform industries and improve lives.
Other Bets includes various subsidiaries and ventures that operate independently from Google's main business, exploring new markets and technologies.
